QuestData.Title: An Offering of Eggs
QuestData.Description:
Our work isn't only to capture and tame gryphons, it's also to preserve them.
Rescue any eggs remaining in nearby abandoned nests. Set them in one of the new nests we've built for the displaced gryphons. I am sure one of the gryphon females will adopt them.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Shawn McClinter at the falls in Westwind Weald.
QuestData.RewardText: The eggs fit nicely into the new nest.
